mention.text: `` 2 southeast Ukrainian regions to hold referendum May 11 as planned The councils of the People s Republics of two southeastern cities of Donetsk and Lugansk won t postpone the referendums on their regions future as part of Ukraine and will hold them as planned on May , 11 , the cities anti-government activists
two southeastern cities of Donetsk and Lugansk
the decision of people of Donbas region
their chance to make a heroic deed
people are determined to organize the referendum
the People s Republic of another eastern Ukrainian city , Lugansk
the refusal of Donetsk and Lugansk regions to postpone the upcoming referendums
Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
activists in the Donetsk and Lugansk regions
supporters of federalization of the country
the Russian president that Ukraine hasn t planned any referendum on May 11
the head of Ukrainian National Security and Defense Committee , Andrey Parubiy
